DOC.brief_summary: Primary purpose of the protocol is to determine if IMA-638 prevents a mild asthma attack by a subject with mild asthma inhaling an allergen.
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating the Effects of IMA-638 on Allergen-Induced Airway Responses in Subjects With Mild Atopic Asthma
DOC.criteria: generally healthy, men and women with mild allergic asthma, aged 18 to 60 years only asthma med is shortacting bronchodilator used not more than twice weekly FEV1 greater than 70% predicted and a demonstrated baseline late response to allergen induction
